attributes.action: UK Visa Support for Turkish and Syrian nationals.
attributes.background:
The Government to introduce an emergency scheme  for citizens who have been effected in the earthquake area in Turkey and Syria. 

The schemes primary objectives are to prevent homeliness and support with mental health as a result of the trauma caused.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/632816
